com.ontolabs.ayllu.grid

Interface LearnerNode

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ClassifierNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseLearnerNode, ClassifierNodeImpl

    public interface LearnerNode
    The Interface LearnerNode is node in the 2D Grid. The responsibility of this interface is to manage its learner and have data in two states. The set/get Data is for training time and setSelected/getSelected is for transition or selection/sampling phase.
